entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
